description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:

summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
